name: node-mongo-registration-login-api
description: NodeJS + MongoDB API for User Management, Authentication and Registration

scripts.local: set PAYMENT_INIT_API_URL=https://api.sandbox.exampleBank.hu/payment-init-1.0&& set REDIRECT_URL=http://localhost:4201&& set WELL_KNOWN_URL=https://api.sandbox.exampleBank.hu/auth/realms/ftb-sandbox/.well-known/openid-configuration&& set CLIENT_ID=demo&& set CLIENT_SECRET=demo&& nodemon ./server.js
